data.title: Clinton
data.meta_description: The CTrail Shore Line East is a fast, frequent, and reliable passenger rail service that connects communities along the I-95 corridor.
data.text:
ELEVATOR STATUS:

View the current status and location of all elevators at CTrail Shore Line East and CTrail Hartford Line stations here.

STATION INFORMATION:

Clinton Station is equipped with pick-up and drop-off areas and a pedestrian bridge for easy accessibility to its opposite platform. Track 1 is the northern track off Central Avenue, and Track 2 is the southern track off West Main Street (behind CVS).

BUS SUBSTITUTION INFORMATION:

All CTrail Shore Line East bus substitutions will pick up and drop off passengers in the parking lot to the west of Clinton station.

CONNECTING TRANSIT ROUTES:

Clinton Station is served by River Valley Transit

Parking:

Daily free parking is available for CTrail Shore Line East commuters 7 days per week. (Park at your own risk.)
